David Nene is an AI Engineer and MSc Data Science & Analytics candidate at Strathmore University with expertise in developing AI-driven solutions for healthcare, agriculture, and public policy. He has a strong portfolio of projects, including an AI-powered lung cancer classification model and a chatbot for efficient document retrieval, emphasizing his commitment to solving socio-economic challenges using data science and artificial intelligence.
